me_descritpion: As a seasoned Full-Stack Developer specializing in Next.js and Expo, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen to the world of fast-paced web and mobile development. With over 5 years of full-stack development experience, I have a deep understanding of the latest technologies and frameworks, on which I stay up to date as much as I possibiliy can, ensuring an optimal client-side experience. My background in finance and a decade-long career in music streaming and Japan entry consulting have honed my ability to not just build, but also strategize with the end-user in mind. My focus is not solely on the technical aspects but also on the real-world problems each project aims to solve. This unique combination of engineering skills and business knowledge positions me as a developer who truly understands the needs of both the client and the end-user, making me a valuable asset in any tech initiative.
the_tech_i_use: The tech I use all the time
